Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: A couple months back a user here made a beautiful post, the last line of which was:   *Am I allowed to call it a struggle if it doesnâ€™t look like defeat?*   I think about those words frequently. How they feel. What they mean. The difference in the answers from my head and my heart. I hope you will find the answer that is effective for you and your one life <3
